title: Did Vice President Mike Pines warn against "angry foreigners "?
subtitle: "Let's say, for example, that these gay aliens can take a human form. What prevents them from sneaking into regular bakeries and bake cookies for gay weddings? First of all...
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Vice President Mike Pines suggested using the planned American "space force" to defend against attacks from "gays in outer space."
